GSSICB_COH06_HH_DJF_Scaled.name: GSSICB_Median_6_day_HH_Coherence_Dec_Jan_Feb_Scaled
GSSICB_COH06_HH_DJF_Scaled.definition: Global winter (December/January/February) median 6-day interferometric coherence (COH06) in HH polarization from the Global Seasonal Sentinel-1 Interferometric Coherence and Backscatter Data Set. The source rasters have been scaled to an integer (values ranging from 0 to 100) by multiplying the coherence values by 100.

GSSICB_COH06_HH_DJF_Unscaled.name: GSSICB_Median_6_day_HH_Coherence_Dec_Jan_Feb_Unscaled
GSSICB_COH06_HH_DJF_Unscaled.definition: Global winter (December/January/February) median 6-day interferometric coherence (COH06) in HH polarization from the Global Seasonal Sentinel-1 Interferometric Coherence and Backscatter Data Set. The default raster function template for this image service converts the scaled source raster values to the normal range of coherence values (0 to 1) by dividing the pixel values of the source rasters by 100.
